languages.text: "Госпожа Хейдари — опасный человек, а опасные люди любят опасные вещи. Джай наверняка неравнодушна к хорошему оружию, у нее даже есть небольшая, но внушающая почтение коллекция. Такой подарок был бы не только практичен, учитывая ее опасное ремесло, но и показал бы, что вы проявили внимание к ее персоне, интересовались ее вкусами. Такие демонстрации личной симпатии очень важны при общении с информ... людьми, которых вы хотите к себе расположить".

"Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Хейдари — опасный человек, а опасные люди любят опасные вещи. Такой подарок был бы не только практичен, учитывая ее опасное ремесло, но и показал бы, что вы проявили внимание к ее персоне, интересовались ее вкусами. Такие демонстрации личной симпатии очень важны при общении с информ... людьми, которых вы хотите к себе расположить".

Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

languages.text: «Maese Heydari es una persona peligrosa, y la gente peligrosa disfruta con cosas peligrosas. Jae debe de sentir predilección por las buenas armas; incluso posee una modesta aunque envidiable colección. Un obsequio de ese tipo no solo sería práctico, dado el riesgo que corre en su oficio; también demostraría interés por ella y por sus aficiones. Y esa clase de demostraciones son muy importantes a la hora de conseguir inform... de congraciarse con otras personas».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

traits.locale_text: «Maese Heydari es una persona peligrosa, y la gente peligrosa disfruta con cosas peligrosas. Jae debe de sentir predilección por las buenas armas; incluso posee una modesta aunque envidiable colección. Un obsequio de ese tipo no solo sería práctico, dado el riesgo que corre en su oficio; también demostraría interés por ella y por sus aficiones. Y esa clase de demostraciones son muy importantes a la hora de conseguir inform... de congraciarse con otras personas».

languages.text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリは危険人物だ。危険人物とは危険なものを好む。ジェイは質の良い武器に精通している――小さいながらも羨望の目を集めるようなコレクションを持っているほどだ。そういった贈り物であれば職業上、実用的なだけでなく、彼女自身の好みを考慮したことを示せる。このような行為は、情報を得――機嫌を取りたい相手と接する際においてかなり重要だ」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

traits.locale_text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリは危険人物だ。危険人物とは危険なものを好む。ジェイは質の良い武器に精通している――小さいながらも羨望の目を集めるようなコレクションを持っているほどだ。そういった贈り物であれば職業上、実用的なだけでなく、彼女自身の好みを考慮したことを示せる。このような行為は、情報を得――機嫌を取りたい相手と接する際においてかなり重要だ」

languages.text: “海达利女士是个危险人物，而危险人物往往会喜欢危险的东西。婕伊很可能对精良的武器很感兴趣，她甚至已经有了好几件令人眼红的小藏品。考虑到她颇具风险的职业，这样的礼物不仅实用，也能代表你对她个人和她的品味很感兴趣。当你想要套取……想要讨好某人的时候，这样的表现非常重要。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

traits.locale_text: “海达利女士是个危险人物，而危险人物往往会喜欢危险的东西。婕伊很可能对精良的武器很感兴趣，她甚至已经有了好几件令人眼红的小藏品。考虑到她颇具风险的职业，这样的礼物不仅实用，也能代表你对她个人和她的品味很感兴趣。当你想要套取……想要讨好某人的时候，这样的表现非常重要。”

languages.text: « Maîtresse Heydari est une femme dangereuse, et les gens dangereux aiment les choses dangereuses. Elle apprécie probablement les armes ; elle en possède même une collection modeste, mais tout à fait enviable. Non seulement un tel cadeau serait adéquat au vu de ses penchants et de ses activités périlleuses, mais il montrerait également que vous vous intéressez à elle en tant que personne. Ces démonstrations sont très importantes pour entretenir les relations avec des informa... des gens dont on souhaite s'attirer les faveurs. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

Non seulement un tel cadeau serait adéquat au vu de ses penchants et de ses activités périlleuses, mais il montrerait également que vous vous intéressez à elle en tant que personne. Ces démonstrations sont très importantes pour entretenir les relations avec des informa... des gens dont on souhaite s'attirer les faveurs. »

languages.text: "Herrin Heydari ist eine gefährliche Person, und gefährliche Personen tun gefährliche Dinge. Jae ist eine große Freundin guter Waffen. Sie hat sogar eine kleine, aber beneidenswerte Sammlung. Ein solches Geschenk wäre nicht nur praktisch, angesichts ihres gefährlichen Berufs, sondern würde auch zeigen, dass Ihr Euch für ihre Person und ihren Geschmack interessiert. Eine solche Demonstration ist äußerst wichtig im Umgang mit Infor- ... mit Personen, deren Gunst man gewinnen will."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

Sie hat sogar eine kleine, aber beneidenswerte Sammlung. Eine solche Demonstration ist äußerst wichtig im Umgang mit Infor- ... mit Personen, deren Gunst man gewinnen will."

Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

languages.text: "Üstat Heydari, tehlikeli bir şahıs. Tehlikeli şahıslar da tehlikeli şeyleri sever. Şöyle güzel bir silah, Jae'ın hoşuna gider bence. Hatta küçük, şık bir koleksiyonu var diye biliyorum. Bu tarz bir hediye, sıkıntılı bir iş yaptığından hem işini görür hem de kendisine ve zevklerine ilgi duyduğun mesajını vermiş olursun. Jestler yapacaksın ki böyle muhbi... Böyle muhterem kimselerin gözüne gireceksin."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is a dangerous person, and dangerous people like dangerous things. Jae is probably partial to good weapons — she even has a small but enviable collection. Such a gift would not only be practical, given her perilous trade, but it would also show that you have taken an interest in her as a person and her tastes. Such demonstrations are very important when dealing with infor— people with whom you would like to curry favour."

traits.locale_text: "Heydari Hanım tehlikeli bir şahıs. Tehlikeli şahıslar da tehlikeli şeyleri sever. Şöyle güzel bir silah, Jae'ın hoşuna gider bence. Hatta küçük, şık bir koleksiyonu var diye biliyorum. Bu tarz bir hediye hem işini görür, sıkıntılı iş yapıyor sonuçta, hem de kendisine ve zevklerine ilgi duyduğun mesajını vermiş olursun. Jestler yapacaksın ki böyle muhbi... Böyle muhterem kimselerin gözüne gireceksin."
